# Coder 2 – Display your CFR table

Population: Confirmed COVID-19 cases (classification 1–3)
Death: Non-missing DATE_DIED (excluding NA/blank/9999-99-99)
Sex filter: r tryCatch(get("sex_filter", inherits = TRUE), error = function(e) "ALL")

```{r cfr_table, echo=FALSE}
read_csv("../output/tables/cfr_by_comorbidity.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  mutate(cfr = percent(cfr, accuracy = 0.1)) |>
  kable(caption = "Case Fatality Rates among Patients with Common Comorbidities")
```
